item.title: Starman racing with his Roadster in space
item.description: SpaceX launched the Falcon Heavy rocket for the first time and what a spectacular launch! Elon Musk’s Tesla Roadster is now racing through space in a highly elliptical orbit around the sun. Video footage was streamed down live from orbit for a few hours after launch: Starman’s orbit around the sun:
